Survey Title: How would you rate KISNA on the following 1-5 Scale: (5-Very Good, 4-Good, 3-Average, 2- Poor, 1- Very Poor )
Question 1: Please rate your experience with the onboarding and induction process.
Question 2: I am satisfied with learning and development opportunities at Kisna.
Question 3: Internal and external training programs have supported my skill enhancement.
Question 4: I clearly understand my job responsibilities and KRAs.
Question 5: I am satisfied with my current role.
Question 6: I feel my skills are being utilized in my current role.
Question 7: My reporting manager provides regular coaching and guidance.
Question 8: I always feel included in team discussions, decisions, work process & policy implementation and activities.
Question 9: My career path and growth opportunity is clear to me.
Question 10: My opinions and ideas are valued by my colleagues and superiors.
Question 11: My individual goals are aligned with my departmental goals.
Question 12: My increments and incentives are fairly linked to performance.
Question 13: I am able to cop up with workload assigned to me.
Question 14: I am satisfied with my work-life balance.
Question 15: I am satisfied with my current compensation.
Question 16: I feel appreciated, recognized and rewarded for my work contributions.
Question 17: I am satisfied with the level of communication from leadership.
Question 18: I feel my personal and family goals are aligned with the company’s goals.
Question 19: I am satisfied with the frequency and quality of feedback I receive.
Question 20: I feel the Meetings which I attend helps me to increase my productivity & performance.
Question 21: I would rate employee referral policy at KISNA.
Question 22: I would rate my overall experience at KISNA.
Question 23: I would rate KISNA’s work culture and work  environment.
Question 24: I would rate my job security at KISNA.

Survey Title: What would be your response for KISNA on the following: (Yes/No)
Question 1: I receive all the necessary information and resources to start my job effectively (for e.g. Laptop, seating arrangement, email ID, visiting card, ID card).
Question 2: I am encouraged to learn from my mistakes without being penalized for failure.
Question 3: HR policies are communicated accurately and on time.
Question 4: My family is happy that I am working with KISNA.
Question 5: I have the freedom to give suggestions for improving systems or processes in my function or the company.
Question 6: I have witnessed or experienced Team Politics, Manager Politics, Favoritism or unfair treatment in the workplace.
Question 7: I would recommend job opportunities at KISNA to others.
Question 8: My work gives me a sense of belonging and being well-utilized.
Question 9: My job responsibilities are aligned with what was communicated to me during the Interview / Hiring process.
Question 10: I feel that men and women have equal opportunities at KISNA.
Question 11: I have the freedom to give suggestions for improving systems or processes in my function or the company.
Question 12: My work schedule is disturbed by the unplanned meeting.
Question 13: I have been given opportunities for external training programs.

Question 7: English / Chinese / German / Italian / Japanese Language Classes
Question 8: Lunch Provision to the Underprivileged on Customer's Birthdays

Question 2: Blazer Day on 13th Of Every Month

Question 4: Blood Donation Camps 3 times a year
Question 18: Customer Gift - Commitment Diary and Personalized Photo Calendar
Question 20: Health Checkup Camps and Consultation Camps

Question 1: What kind of work which we are doing, should be continued?
Question 2: What kind of work which we are doing, should not be done?
Question 3: What kind of work which we are not doing, should be done?
